attributes.action: cease all financial aid to Sudan in recognition of its inhumane treatment of Gillian Gibbons,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gillian Gibbons, a 54 year old teacher who went to Sudan to help, has had her good intentions thrown in her face, and in the process Sudan has offered a total insult to Great Britain, by being imprisoned and deported for allowing the children in her class to call a teddy bear Mohammed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
